text: <@U0PB67X4K>: "local" means the machine of the client (non-fabric node).
<@U11CP8FF1>, <@U0KM61BCP>: Thanks for advice. Do you perform the operation in fabric node or which of the client machine (non-fabric node)?
@daisuke -san:   I use Docker images to run fabric node. I have deployed the chaincode on Docker host machine which is running "peer" process image.
